data.event: Major development was anticipated after the railroad reached Naples on January 7, 1927, and the Tamiami Trail linking Naples to Miami was completed in 1928, but did not begin until after the Great Depression and World War II.

Major development was anticipated after the railroad reached Naples on January 7, 1927, and the Tamiami Trail linking Naples to Miami was completed in 1928, but did not begin until after the Great Depression and World War II.

event.title: used it for training purposes; it is now

data.event: During the war the U.S. Army Air Forces built a small air field and used it for training purposes; it is now the Naples Municipal Airport.
